Meet Maria
Reform UK Candidate for the Wainfleet Division
Hello there! It's great to meet you.
To tell you a little bit about me:
I'm about to turn 52 and decided to run for the role of the local councillor due to my disappointment in our current political classes.
I think it's time for change - and bringing in new people with a lifetime of experience, I think, can help us to change things for the better, for us all.
I have been a psychological therapist for many years now, and used to work in an NHS mental health service. This opened my eyes to so many of the problems we all face in every day life, and I wanted to be able to do more.
If you have any questions, or would like to just say hello, please do feel free to email me at hume.maria@gmail.com.

GET INVOLVED
Would you like to help? Here is how you can get involved:
There are many ways to volunteer, from walking door to door to fundraising and sometimes, just talking about it with your neighbours can help so much to spread the word.
MAKE A DONATION
If you would prefer to make a donation, no matter how small, it helps our team in Boston & Skegness to get out there and get others involved. You can donate via:
https://donate.reformparty.uk/boston-skegness
BECOME A VOLUNTEER
If you want to help by dropping leaflets, please email me at hume.maria@gmail.com
